main event: A bright white light was observed, resembling a star, for approximately 30 seconds on 7 September 1956.
interesting points: The object was described as holding a size of 22.5° x 18° when observed at arm's length,The object was fully illuminated before tapering off,The tail of the object was about three times the size of the object itself,The sighting lasted 20-30 seconds,Concluded that the sighting was probably caused by a mirage.
